## MietteError() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function MietteError(error: IError): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | [IError](./miette.ierror.md) | An instance of an error object to be used by the diagnostic reporter |
